alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 3:03PM MST until November 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches, mainly in the higher areas west of Sheridan. Wet roads may freeze this evening and become quite slick, including I-90 in the Sheridan area. * WHERE...Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely be slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Persons should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.
